system.description:
When you activate this maneuver, you take the attack action as well as any attacks granted by Extra attack. At least one attack must be used to attempt to free another creature from the grappled or restrained condition. Creatures grappling or restraining your allies have disadvantage on saving throws made to maintain those conditions, and you have advantage on attacks against objects that are grappling or restraining your allies such as chains or manacles.

In addition, until the end of your turn, your speed is not reduced on account of dragging or carrying the creature.
